NAME:DESMEULES, Leo Joseph                 BIRTHPLACE:Big River, SK           ENTERED SERVICE:  April, 1936  DATES:19  Sept.  1919  -

Appointments & Service

Outfit Year*:            Position:         Post:                         District:              HBCA Reference:

*An Outfit year ran from 1 June to 31 May

1936-1937                Deliveryman       Red Lake                      Superior-Huron         RG3/41A/2

1937, 15 August          Resigned because of low wages                                          RG3/41A/2

Education: McDougall's Mills, Grades 1-2; Sioux Lookout, Grades 3-7; Red Lake, Grades 8-11

Previous Employment: Delivery, Red Lake Supply Co., Oct. 1935-Apr. 1936

               ARCHIVES

               WINNIPEG

Filename: Desmeules, Leo Joseph (fl. 1936-1937) ; AM/Dec. 1995 ; June/99/mhd
